sentences: You’ve got great leadership skills, _NAME_.
Your voice is magnificent, _NAME_.

Your perspective is refreshing, _NAME_.
Your outlook on life is amazing, _NAME_.

Your kindness is a balm to all who encounter it, _NAME_.
Your creative potential seems limitless, _NAME_.
Your ability to recall random factoids at just the right time is impressive, _NAME_.
You've got an awesome sense of humor, _NAME_!
You're wonderful, _NAME_.
You're strong, _NAME_.
You're someone's reason to smile, _NAME_.
You're so thoughtful, _NAME_.
You're really something special, _NAME_.
You're one of a kind, _NAME_!
You're more helpful than you realize, _NAME_.
You're more fun than bubble wrap, _NAME_.
You're more fun than a ball pit filled with candy, _NAME_.
You're like a ray of sunshine on a really dreary day, _NAME_.
You're like a breath of fresh air, _NAME_.
You're great at figuring stuff out, _NAME_.
You're even more beautiful on the inside than you are on the outside, _NAME_.
You're even better than a unicorn, because you're real, _NAME_.
You're better than a triple-scoop ice cream cone. With sprinkles, _NAME_.

You're a gift to those around you, _NAME_.

You should be proud of yourself, _NAME_.

You make my insides jump around in the best way, _NAME_.
You make me want to be a better person, _NAME_.
You make me float up like I’m on millions of bubbles, _NAME_.

You look so young, _NAME_!
You look great today, _NAME_.

You inspire me, _NAME_.

You have a good head on your shoulders, _NAME_.

You deserve a hug right now, _NAME_.

You bring out the best in other people, _NAME_.
You are the reason I am smiling today, _NAME_.
You are the most perfect you there is, _NAME_.
You are stunning, _NAME_.
You are strong, _NAME_.

You are really courageous, _NAME_.

You are awesome, _NAME_!
You are an excellent friend, _NAME_.
You are always so helpful, _NAME_.
You are a great example to others, _NAME_.
You always know just what to say, _NAME_.
You always know -- and say -- exactly what I need to hear when I need to hear it, _NAME_.
You always find something special in the most ordinary things, _NAME_.
Who raised you? They deserve a medal for a job well done, _NAME_.
When you're not afraid to be yourself is when you're most incredible, _NAME_.
When you say, "I meant to do that, " I totally believe you, _NAME_.
When you say you will do something, I trust you, _NAME_.
When you make up your mind about something, nothing stands in your way, _NAME_.
When you make a mistake, you try to fix it, _NAME_.
When I'm down you always say something encouraging to help me feel better, _NAME_.
There's ordinary, and then there's you, _NAME_.
The way you treasure your loved ones is incredible, _NAME_.
The people you love are lucky to have you in their lives, _NAME_.
That thing you don't like about yourself is what makes you so interesting, _NAME_.
That color looks perfect on you, _NAME_.
Thank you for being you, _NAME_.
Someone is getting through something hard right now because you've got their back, _NAME_.
Somehow you make time stop and fly at the same time, _NAME_.
Our community is better because you're in it, _NAME_.
On a scale from 1 to 10, you're an 11, _NAME_.
Nothing can stop you, _NAME_.
Jokes are funnier when you tell them, _NAME_.
In high school I bet you were voted "_NAME_: most likely to keep being awesome."
If you were a scented candle, _NAME_, they'd call it Perfectly Imperfect (and it would smell like summer).
If you were a box of crayons, you'd be the giant name-brand one with the built-in sharpener, _NAME_.
If someone based an Internet meme on you, it would have impeccable grammar, _NAME_.

I enjoy spending time with you, _NAME_.

I appreciate you, _NAME_.
I am really glad we met, _NAME_.

Hanging out with you is always a blast, _NAME_.

Everything seems brighter when you are around, _NAME_.
Everyone gets knocked down sometimes, but you always get back up and keep going, _NAME_.
Even the things you don’t like about yourself make you interesting, _NAME_.
Colors seem brighter when you're around, _NAME_.
Being around you makes everything better, _NAME_!
